verses.text:
Come unto me, sin-burdened, What before the cross weighed,
Thy is the precious one, the Man, Lord, thy sins in chains,
Thy is the precious one, the Man, Lord, thy sins in chains.

Let me hold till you possessing From the savior's lying Friend,
For thy days of ease are numbered, and thy hour of rest,
Rest thy weary head on me, thou afflicted, thou distressed.

I will give thee rest, my servant, Rest in me: Lord, I gladly rest in thee,
